Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
This divisible newly built-out office suite offering up to 26,345 SF is available
for a long-term sublease opportunity. The space includes a reception area,
open bullpen space, private offices, conference room, a large break room,
restrooms, storage and copy room.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Move-in ready space; furniture could be available
Easy accessibility to I-90 via Exit 52A (William Street) and Exit 53 (Walden Avenue)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located approximately 1 mile from I-90 at Exit 52A (William Street) and approximately 2 miles from amenities in and around Walden Galleria.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
This divisible newly built-out office suite offering up to 26,345 SF is available for a long-term sublease opportunity. The space includes a reception area, open bullpen space, private offices, conference room, a large break room, restrooms, storage and copy room.

Located in AppleTree Business Park, a 466,000 SF office complex in Cheektowaga, New York. Several on-site amenities include a cafe, convenience store, fitness center, daycare, and banking. A former shopping mall, the office park features long and spacious corridors which encourage interior walkability.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Located 3 miles from Buffalo Niagara International Airport

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is adjacent to I-90 and conveniently located among a wide variety of retail and industrial businesses in Cheektowaga, New York.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Creating a compelling office experience to bring employees together is more important than ever before.

York Factory is created for enterprises seeking a solution for the modern workforce.
Our highly amenitized and inspiring workspaces are designed to optimize health,
happiness and productivity.

York Factory is directly connected to Walden Galleria, the Buffalo Niagara regionâ€™s
premier shopping, dining and entertainment center and offers up to 99,500 SF and ample, free parking on-site just minutes from downtown Buffalo.

Note: Occupancy of these properties is currently subject to existing property documents as well as leases in favor of LeTote and will be available only at the conclusion or earlier termination of the leases.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Immediate highway access to I-190 via Exit 1 (S. Ogden St./Dingens St.)
Ample free parking for over 100 vehicles

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Gateway Office Park provides immediate access to I-190 and I-90 at Exit 1 (S. Ogden St./Dingens St.)

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Two adjoining office building with suites from 1,000 - 6,000 SF at the Gateway Office Park in Cheektowaga, New York.
